attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I personnaly belive that students have life very easy. they constantly complain about living life hard,yet they find the time to party till unsightly hours of the morning, wether it be alcohol or drugs(both usualy).
I think this would wein out the true beleivers from the slackers and time wasters

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
